content.text:
# Kingo Hamada

| birth_place = Shinjuku, Tokyo, Japan
| occupation =
| instrument = Bass guitar, guitar, keyboards
| genre = }}
| years_active = 1974–present
| label =
| website =
}}
(born January 17, 1953) is a Japanese singer-songwriter.
Life and career
Hamada was a member of the folk group Craft before pursuing a solo career.
At one point, when Shōgo Hamada, who was not related to Kingo, was becoming popular, the latter's agency and record label gave him the tagline .
Impact
In 2017, "Crystal Dolphin" by Engelwood sampled "Machi no Dorufin" from Hamada's 1982 midnight cruisin' album. "Crystal Dolphin" later became a popular Internet meme. The original song, Machi No Dorufin, gained widespread prominence as a result of Engelwood's sample.
